unnormalised: Bore, aichem chitr sod: Somvar sokall, 9 voram exact, ani mhojem inbox poilech futtonk laglam. Vegvegllea time zone-ancher meetings schedule korop, honestly mhojea tax-anchem somzonni gheunche porosui odik complicated asa! Amchea lagim Mumbai-nt ek team asa, dusri London-nt, ani magir boss, zo sogllea vellar New York ani Delhi-chea modem jet-setting kortat. Tem ek logistical nightmare, hanv tumkam sangtam.
normalised: Borem, mhunnchitra dhara: Somaraachem sokall, nove A-M sharp, ani mhojem inbox poileach pavttim futt'tta. Vegvegllea vellar zomnichi meeting korop khorench mhojea taxank somzunk sodd'ddop asat! Mumboi-n ek team asa, London-an dusri, ani magir bos, zo sokallchea vellar New York ani Delhi modem jet-setting korto. Tem ek logistical sopno, hanv tuka sangtam.

unnormalised: Ani daylight savings vixim mhaka sangunkuch naka. Hanv shappat ghetto, dor vorsak, tem puro schedule ekdompurben asantulank hadta. Ekaich pavtim, 2 voranchem meeting 1 vorachem zata, vo odik vaitt, puro skip zata kiteak konnem tori aplo calendar adjust korunk visrunk gela. Tem amchea soglleanchea sangelem ghoddlam!
normalised: Ani daylight savingsacher kainch suru korunk naka. Hanv sopath gheun sangtam, dor vorsak, tem pura schedule ekdom' vichkil kel'lem asata. Eknem, don P-M meeting ek P-M meeting zata, vo khoreponnim visrunk mellta kiteak konnem aplea calendarak adjust korunk visronk nam. Tem boreant boreank ghelolem asa!

unnormalised: Magir suttio asat. Of course, dor eka zannak Diwali-k (around 10/24 hea vorsak, mhaka dista?), Christmas-k (12/25), ani Eid-k sutti gheunk zai asta. Jem totally somzonk mellta, punn jevnna office adhem suttier astana dor eka zannak kamak lagpi vel sodunk mhonttlear ghainchi sui sodunchea sarkhem. Mhaka dista kednam konnankui office-ant suttiechea sangata company-chea shared calendar-an dor eka zannachea suttiechim nondaani korun dovrunk zata?
normalised: Ani thoddeach disank utsav zatat. Of course, dor ekleak Diwali (sod'deak chovis Octoberak hantun, mhaka dista?), Christmas (pachis December), ani Eidak off gheunk zai. Tem puro somzonk zogo, punn sobheank vhoddeachem odhlem office leaveacher astit tanhnem konnakui kamak poddonk somay mellounk ek ghossachem sui mellounk bhaxen asa. Hanv chintam sod'deak ek company-wide shared calendar dor ekleak leave mark kel'lea borem marg asa?

unnormalised: Hanven sogllim sort-chea scheduling tools vaprun dekhlea, punn tankam soglleank aplem vegllemपन asta. Tankam thoddeank Indian Standard Time (IST) yogy reeten samrunk yetona, ani thodde vapurpakuch confuse kortat. Mhaka kollta, ami soglle ব্যস্ত आसाट, punn fokot 30-min-anchi call schedule korpak fokot ek vor vorchea vorta? Tem fokot efficient na. Hanv asherta ki hantuntlim thodim scheduling platforms tankam ek koddak haddtolim ani Indian context-ak thode samrunk zataat.
normalised: Hanvem soglle prakarachem scheduling tools vaprunk prayatn kele, punn teanche soglleanche ap-aple quirks dista. Thoddeank Indian Standard Time (I-S-T) borench handle korunk dista, dusreank vaprunk puro avaddta. Hanv mhanta, mhaka thavuk asa, ami soglle zoddpi asat, punn ek vorak ek tin minisacho call schedule korunk sodd'ddeunk zata? Tem matui efficient nam. Hanv khuxal assam thodde scheduling platforman tanchem kam borench korunk ani Indian kontekstak thoddem accommodate korunk.

unnormalised: Mhaka mell'lolo boreant boreo trick mhonttlear postpone korchea bodlek 'prepone' korop. Tumkam dista ki tankam 3 satthodde lagtole, punn don demand kor. Tem tumkam reschedule korpak thode buffer dita, vo amchea khas Indian reeten 'adjust' korpak dita. Tea strategy-n mhojem rear odik pavtim save kelam je hanv admit korchea porosui.
normalised: Borem trick, hanvem mellovn asa, tem postpone korunk porim 'prepone' kar. Tuka dista ki teen zalle lagtalem, donache zago mag. Tuka thoddem buffer diunk, vo 'adjust' amchea khas Indian margan korunk. Tea strategy-n mhojem fattim chodd pavttim vatovnk asa mhunn hanv sodtam.

unnormalised: Ani 'adjustments' vixim uloitana - Indian Stretching Time khatir 'IST' chi kalpona ekdom khari asa. 11:00 AM-ak plan kel'le meetings 11:15 AM *poile* chalu zata. Hem "buffer" mhojea planning-ant bandhop mhaka ek life-saver mhonn zata! Honestly.
normalised: Ani 'adjustments' vislean uloitam- Indian Stretching Timeache 'I-S-T'achem vichar S-O khorem. Egar zero zero A-Machem meeting jarang zatat *poilim* egar pandra A-M. Heam "bufferak" mhajea planant bandho divn mhozo jiv vatovnk asa! Khorench.

unnormalised: Eke pavtim, hanven ek meeting 12:00 AM IST mhunn schedule kelem mhaka dislem tem noon aslem, punn magir mhaka koll'lem ki tem midnight aslem! London-achi team ratchea modhea vellar ek call-ak join zaunk khux nasli, hanv tumkam sangtam. Lesson learned: time zone-anchem double-check korat, sodankal!
normalised: Ek pavttim, mhaka visrunch ek meeting bara zero zero A-M I-S-T sanddlelem dukar mhunn chintun noon asunk, punn magir kollunk ki temi ratri bhitorchem vochondhrem! Londonchea teamek ratri bhitorchem kallak ek callak zoddunk puro utsuknaslo, hanv tuka sangtam. Lesson sanddlelem: time zone double-check kar, dor pavttim!

unnormalised: Mhunnun, ho, time zone-ancher schedule korop ಖಂಡಿತ ek challenge asa. Punn thodea patience, thodea borea tools, ani ek puro chai-n, ami kedna tori tem kaam korun dhakhoitav. Kiteak hanv mhoje deskak ek vhoddlem jagtik ঘड़ियां বিনিয়োগ korunk zatat. Pun, mhaka kollta mhoji kismot, tem ਸ਼ੁੱਕਰਵਾਰ 3:30 PM-ak بند zaunk zata.
normalised: Zait, scheduling time zoneam modem khatri zori ek challenge asa. Punn thoddea dhirak, thoddea borem toolsak, ani puri chaiak, ami konnakui tem kam karunk zata. Zait hanv ek khorench voddeak world clock mhojea deskak invest karta. Dhortam, mhojem nasib mellta, tem sokallchea sanddlum three thirty P-Machem Sukravaar.
